Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has full focus and attent to the work i provide for improvements. Teacher still has some possible human error or oversight on spceific details that would help me fully improve my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI was helpful to explore strengths and weaknesses of my work, allowing me to pin point common areas of weaknesses that i needed to work on. Teacher feedback aomsetimes feels rushed.
